StockListDW.Description: European eel (Anguilla anguilla) throughout its natural range
StockListDW.Discards: not included

StockListDW.Description: Norway lobster (Nephrops spp.) in Division IV, outside the Functional Units (North Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: no, information

StockListDW.Description: Norway lobster (Nephrops spp.) in Division VIa, outside the Functional Units (West of Scotland)
StockListDW.Discards: wanted catch advice

StockListDW.Description: Norway lobster (Nephrops spp.) in Subarea VII, outside the Functional Units (Southern Celtic Seas, Southwest of Ireland)
StockListDW.Discards: wanted catch advice

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Run-reconstruction models and Bayesian forecasts, taking into account uncertainties in data and process error. Results presented in a risk analysis framework.
StockListDW.Description: Atlantic salmon (Salmo salar) in the Northeast Atlantic
StockListDW.Discards: Discards included in risk-based framework for the Faroes fishery. Not relevant for other NEAC assessments.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Run reconstruction models and Bayesian forecasts, taking into account uncertainties in the data.
StockListDW.Description: Atlantic salmon (Salmo salar) in Subarea XIV and NAFO areas 1A–1F (East and West of Greenland)
StockListDW.Discards: No salmon discards in this fishery.

StockListDW.Description: Angel shark (Squatina squatina) in the Northeast Atlantic
Alfonsinos/Golden eye perch (Beryx spp.) in the Northeast Atlantic
Black-bellied anglerfish (Lophius budegassa) in Divisions VIIIc and IXa (Cantabrian Sea, Atlanic Iberian Waters)
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is assumed to be negligible.
StockListDW.ICESBook: Bay of Biscay and Iberian Sea

StockListDW.Description: Anchovy (Engraulis encrasicolus) in Subarea VIII (Bay of Biscay)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included and are considered negligible.
StockListDW.ICESBook: Bay of Biscay and Iberian Sea
StockListDW.Precautionary: Yes (to be confirmed after the review)

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Survey based assessment without catch advice
StockListDW.Description: Anchovy (Engraulis encrasicolus) in Division IXa (Atlantic Iberian Waters)
StockListDW.Discards: Discard estimates are available for some fisheries in 2014 and are considered negligible.
StockListDW.ICESBook: Bay of Biscay and Iberian Sea

StockListDW.Description: Anglerfish (Lophius piscatorius and L. budegassa) in Subareas IV, VI and Division IIIa (North Sea, Rockall and West of Scotland, Skagerrak and Kattegatt)
StockListDW.Discards: Discard estimates are available from 2012.

StockListDW.Description: White anglerfish (Lophius piscatorius) in Divisions VIIIc and IXa (Cantabrian Sea, Atlanic Iberian Waters)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are not quantified and assumed to be negligible.
StockListDW.ICESBook: Bay of Biscay and Iberian Sea

StockListDW.Description: Greater silver smelt (Argentina silus) in Subarea XIV and Division Va (East Grrenland, Iceland Grounds)
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is considered to be negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Blue ling (Molva dypterygia) in Subarea XIV and Division Va (East Greenland, Iceland grounds)
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is considered to be negligible

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Multi-Year Catch Curves (MYCC), a model fitted to age composition and total catch in order to estimate annual total mortality (Z).
StockListDW.Description: Blue ling (Molva dypterygia) in Subareas VI-VII and Division Vb (Celtic Seas, English Channel and Faroes Grounds)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible

StockListDW.Description: Blue ling (Molva dypterygia) in Subareas I, II, VIII, IX, and XII and Divisions IIIa and IVa (other areas)
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is considered to be negligible

StockListDW.Description: Brill (Scophthalmus rhombus) in Subdivisions 22–32 (Baltic Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Used to provide advice. Discards were below 1% in 2012 and 2013 but are now estimated to be 13.5% in 2014.

StockListDW.Description: Brill (Scophthalmus rhombus) in Subarea IV and Divisions IIIa and VIId,e (North Sea, Skagerrak and Kattegat, English Channel)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are included in the assessment (2012–2014).

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Exploratory Bayesian Schaefer surplus production model
StockListDW.Description: Boarfish (Capros aper) in Subareas VI-VIII (Celtic Seas and the English Channel, Bay of Biscay)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards from non-directed fisheries since 2003 have been included in the assessment.

StockListDW.Description: Basking shark (Cetorhinus maximus) in the Northeast Atlantic

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Model based on acoustic survey and prediction six months ahead to calculate spawning biomass. The model estimates maturity, growth, and mortality (including predation by immature cod on pre-spawning capelin). Target escapement strategy used.
StockListDW.Description: Capelin (Mallotus villosus) in Subareas I and II (Northeast Arctic), excluding Division IIa west of 5°W (Barents Sea capelin)
StockListDW.Discards: All catches are assumed to be landed

StockListDW.AssessmentType: model which takes into account CV in surveys and predation from cod, haddock, and saithe of capelin and p(SSB< Blim|Catch)< 0.05
StockListDW.Description: Capelin (Mallotus villosus) in Subareas V and XIV and Division IIa west of 5°W (Iceland and Faroes Grounds, East Greenland, Jan Mayen area)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subdivisions 22–24 (Western Baltic Sea)
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment since 1994, data series from the main fleets.

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subdivisions 25–32 (Eastern Baltic Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are available and used to provide catch advice, with data series from all the main fleets.

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subarea IV and Divisions VIId and IIIa West (North Sea, Eastern English Channel, Skagerrak)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards included, data series from the main fleets (in 2014 covering 69% of the landings by weight in Subarea IV, 75% in Division IIIa–Skagerrak, and 83% in Division VIId).

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Age-based analytical assessment (XSA) that uses landings in the model and in the forecast.
StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Divisions VIIe–k (Western English Channel and Southern Celtic Seas)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included in the assessment and the advice. Discards are normally composed of undersized fish in the order of 10% by weight, but this fluctuates when large year classes recruit to the fishery or when quotas are restrictive.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Age-based analytical assessment (XSA) with cannibalism estimated
StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subareas I and II (Northeast Arctic)
StockListDW.Discards: All catches are assumed to be landed

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subareas I and II (Norwegian coastal waters cod)
StockListDW.Discards: Based on survey trends.

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subdivision Vb2 (Faroe Bank)
StockListDW.Discards: Negligible.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: XSA with catch-at-age data and age-disaggregated indices
StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Subdivision Vb1 (Faroe Plateau)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: A forward-based statistical catch-at-age model that is implemented in the AD model builder, using catches in the model and in the forecast.
StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Division Va (Iceland grounds)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Division VIIa (Irish Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Used to provide advice, but not included in the assessment. Discard information available since 2007.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Age-based analytical assessment (stochastic state–space model SAM) considered indicative of trends only
StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Division IIIa East (Kattegat)
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment, data series from the majority of the fleets (covering 87% of the landings).

StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Division VIb (Rockall)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included and considered negligible.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Analytical age-based assessment (TSA) that uses catches in the model and in the forecast.
StockListDW.Description: Cod (Gadus morhua) in Division VIa (West of Scotland)
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and the forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment, data series from the main fleets (covering 86% of the landings).

StockListDW.Description: Portuguese dogfish (Centroscymnus coelolepis) and leafscale gulper shark (Centrophorus squamosus) in the Northeast Atlantic
Dab in Subdivisions 22 - 32 (Baltic Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Discard data from 2012 onwards were used in the advice.

StockListDW.Description: Dab in Subarea IV and Division IIIa
StockListDW.Discards: Discards were quantified for the period 2012–2014. Discards ranged between 87% and 93% of the total catch. In 2014 discard information was provided for 59% of the total landings.

StockListDW.Description: Spurdog (Squalus acanthias) in the Northeast Atlantic
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is known to take place but cannot be quantified.

StockListDW.Description: Flounder in Division IIIa and Subarea IV
StockListDW.Discards: Discards were quantified for the years 2012–2014. Discards ranged between 42% and 46% of total catch. In 2014 discard information was provided for 90% of the total landings.

StockListDW.Description: Tope (Galeorhinus galeus) in the Northeast Atlantic
Greater forkbeard (Phycis blennoides) in the Northeast Atlantic
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are substantial but are only quantified for part of the fisheries

StockListDW.Description: Greenland halibut in Subareas I and II
StockListDW.Discards: All catches are assumed to be landed

StockListDW.AssessmentType: probabilistic (Bayesian) version of a surplus production model
StockListDW.Description: Greenland halibut in Subareas V, VI, XII and XIV
StockListDW.Discards: Negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Grey gurnard in Subarea IV (North Sea) and Divisions VIId (Eastern Channel) and IIIa (Skagerrak - Kattegat)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are known to take place but cannot be quantified.

StockListDW.Description: Leafscale gulper shark (Centrophorus squamosus) in the Northeast Atlantic

StockListDW.AssessmentType: ASAP (Age-Structured Assessment Programme; NOAA toolbox) that uses catches in the model and in the forecast.
StockListDW.Description: Haddock in Divisions VIIb,c,e-k
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and the forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment for the full time-series.

StockListDW.Description: Haddock in Subareas I and II (Northeast Arctic)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are known to take place but cannot be quantified

StockListDW.AssessmentType: XSA with catch-at-age data and age-disaggregated indices
StockListDW.Description: Haddock in Division Vb
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are not included and are assumed negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Haddock in Division Va (Icelandic haddock)
StockListDW.Discards: Haddock is caught in mixed demersal fisheries, sometimes as a large proportion of the catch, sometime as bycatch. Discarding due to high-grading was up to 20% by weight in the late 1990s, but has been less than 2% in recent years.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: SURBA analysis based on survey information, considered indicative of trends only.
StockListDW.Description: Haddock in Division VIIa (Irish Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included in the assessment and the advice. Discards are normally composed of undersized fish in the order of 10% by weight, but this fluctuates when large year classes recruit to the fishery or when quotas are restrictive.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Analytical age-based assessment (XSA) that uses catches in the model and in the forecast.
StockListDW.Description: Haddock in Division VIb (Rockall)
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and the forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Not included in the assessment and the advice. Discards are normally composed of undersized fish in the order of 10% by weight, but this fluctuates when large year classes recruit to the fishery or when quotas are restrictive.

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Subdivisions 25 - 29 (excluding Gulf of Riga) and 32
StockListDW.Discards: Not included; considered negligible

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Subdivision 30 (Bothnian Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Exploratory age-based assessment (XSA) considered indicative of trends only
StockListDW.Description: Herring in Subdivision 31 (Bothnian Bay)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included and are assumed negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Division IIIa and Subdivisions 22 - 24 (Western Baltic spring spawners)
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is considered to be negligible. The amount of slippage in Division IIIa is unknown.

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Subarea IV and Divisions IIIa and VIId (North Sea autumn spawners)
StockListDW.Discards: Considered to be negligible.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Age-based analytical assessment (ASAP; ICES, 2015a) that uses catches in the model and in the forecast.

StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment (covering 4% of the Irish landings raised to total catch)

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Age-based analytical assessment (FLSAM; ICES, 2015a) that uses catches in the model and in the forecast.
StockListDW.Description: Herring in Division VIIa North of 52° 30’ N (Irish Sea)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are considered to be negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Subareas I, II, V and Divisions IVa and XIVa (Norwegian spring-spawning herring)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Subdivision 28.1 (Gulf of Riga)
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Herring in Division Va (Icelandic summer-spawners)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are not included and are assumed negligible. Industrial bycatch is included.

StockListDW.Description: Hake in Division IIIa, Subareas IV, VI and VII and Divisions VIIIa,b,d (Northern stock)
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Data series from most fleets are available; 75% of the observed discards are included in the assessment (ICES, 2014a). Additional discards (2.6% of landings) are used to top up the advice.

StockListDW.Description: Hake in Division VIIIc and IXa (Southern stock)
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and forecast

StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.Discards: Not included and are considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Horse mackerel (Trachurus trachurus) in Divisions IIa, IVa, Vb, VIa, VIIa-c, e-k, VIII (Western stock)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are known to take place but are only quantified for part of the fisheries (discards in 2014 were below 1.5% in weight, 95% of the landings covered), and are considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Blue jack mackerel (Trachurus picturatus) in Subdivision Xa2 (Azores)

StockListDW.Description: Lemon sole in Subarea IV and Divisions IIIa and VIId
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are known to take place and have been quantified for 2013−2014. Discard estimates were provided for 78% of the landings in 2014.

StockListDW.Description: Ling (Molva molva) in Subdivisions I and II
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is considered to be negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Ling (Molva molva) in Division Vb
StockListDW.Discards: Discarding is considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Ling (Molva molva) in Division Va
StockListDW.Discards: Not included, considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Ling in (Molva molva) Divisions IIIa and IVa, and in Subareas VI, VII, VIII, IX, XII, and XIV (other areas)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are estimated at < 5% of the catch and are considered negligible.

StockListDW.Description: Mackerel in the Northeast Atlantic (combined Southern, Western and North Sea spawning components)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are known to take place, but are only quantified for part of the fisheries (0.5% in weight in 2014), the proportion of the landings covered cannot be calculated. Discards are considered negligible.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Bayesian state–space biomass dynamic model that uses catches in the model and in the forecast.

StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and the forecast

StockListDW.Description: Megrim (Lepidorhombus spp) in ICES Division VIb (Rockall)
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: ICES cannot quantify the corresponding catches.

StockListDW.Description: Four-spot megrim (Lepidorhombus boscii) in Divisions VIIIc and IXa
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment for all data series from the majority of the fleet.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Statistical catch at age model accepted for trends
StockListDW.Description: Megrim (Lepidorhombus whiffiagonis) in Divisions VIIb-k and VIIIa,b,d
StockListDW.Discards: n.a.

StockListDW.Description: Megrim (Lepidorhombus whiffiagonis) in Divisions VIIIc and IXa
StockListDW.DiscardUsedForAdvice: used in the assessment and forecast
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment for all data series from the majority of the fleet.

StockListDW.Discards: Used to provide advice, but not included in the assessment. Discard rates and individual weights for this stock are unknown. Values from neighbouring Nephrops stocks were applied to generate the total catch advice.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Underwater TV survey combined with yield-per-recruit analysis from length data.
StockListDW.Description: Nephrops in Division VIa (North Minch, FU 11)
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment since 1990, data series from the majority of the main fleets covering all landings.

StockListDW.AssessmentType: Underwater TV survey combined with yield-per-recruit analysis from length data.
StockListDW.Description: Nephrops in Division VIa (South Minch, FU 12)
StockListDW.Discards: Included in the assessment since 1990; data series from the majority of the main fleets cover almost all landings.

StockListDW.AdditionalInfo: New Jan 2015. rsg-nea code changed in wgdeep to tsu-nea
StockListDW.Description: Roughsnout grenadier (Trachyrincus scabrus) in the Northeast Atlantic
StockListDW.Discards: unknown

StockListDW.Description: Anglerfish (Lophius piscatorius and L. budegassa) in Subareas I and II (Northeast Arctic)
StockListDW.Discards: Discards are known to take place but are only quantified for part of the fisheries (discards are 7% in weight for 82% of the landings covered).
